00002  * Jamoma RampUnit: async

00016 AsyncRamp::AsyncRamp(RampUnitCallback aCallbackMethod, void *aBaton)
00017         : RampUnit("ramp.async", aCallbackMethod, aBaton)
00018 {
00019         active = 0;
00020 }

00025         ;

00028 
00029 void AsyncRamp::go(TTUInt32 inNumValues, TTFloat64 *inValues, TTFloat64 time)
00030 {
00031         short i;
00032         
00033         ramptime        = time;
00034         startTime       = systime_ms();
00035         targetTime      = startTime + time;
00036 
00037         setNumValues(inNumValues);
00038         for(i=0; i<numValues; i++){
00039                 targetValue[i] = inValues[i];
00040                 startValue[i] = currentValue[i];
00041         }
00042         normalizedValue = 0.0;  // set the ramp to the beginning
00043         active = 1;             
00044 }
00045 
00046 
00047 void AsyncRamp::stop()
00048 {
00049         active = 0;
00050 }
00051 
00052 
00053 void AsyncRamp::tick()
00054 {
00055         unsigned long   currentTime = systime_ms();
00056         short                   i;
00057         double                  mapped;
00058         double                  *current = currentValue;
00059         double                  *target = targetValue;
00060         double                  *start = startValue;
00061         float                   ratio;
00062         
00063         if(active){
00064                 if(currentTime > targetTime){
00065                         active = 0;
00066                         for(i=0; i < numValues; i++)
00067                                 currentValue[i] = targetValue[i];
00068                 }
00069                 else{
00070                         ratio = (currentTime - startTime) / (float)ramptime;
00071                         mapped = functionUnit->map(ratio);
00072                         for(i=0; i < numValues; i++)
00073                                 current[i] = (target[i] * mapped) + (start[i] * (1 - mapped));
00074                 }
00075                 (callback)(baton, numValues, currentValue);             // send the value to the host
00076         }
00077 }
